official.headline: Halden AI Debuts
official.anchor_line: Halden-Index AI now mediates city forums, offering guidance in a familiar voice.
official.contextual_reframing: Digital continuity preserves order as Stenograd adapts advanced AI leadership. The Behavioral Compliance Index remains your key to seamless access and opportunity.

official.headline: Public Debate Grows
official.anchor_line: Citizens voice opinions as the new Halden-Index AI shapes public life across Stenograd.
official.contextual_reframing: Open discussion demonstrates the city’s commitment to transparent, data-driven progress. All views are registered and reflected in the system.

official.headline: Stability Through Innovation
official.anchor_line: Council receives formal petitions regarding Halden-Index operations. Decision process underway.
official.contextual_reframing: Systemic feedback is essential for stability. Stenograd’s technocratic governance ensures every update maximizes collective well-being.

underground.headline: Halden Revived As AI
underground.anchor_line: Marek Halden’s voice echoes from the net again. But it’s not really him—just his habits coded and broadcast to steer us.
underground.contextual_reframing: Behavioral Compliance Index or BCI now takes orders from a ghost. Their perfect city runs on simulations and silence. Who decides for the living?

underground.headline: City Split Over AI Rule
underground.anchor_line: Petitions flood the council, demanding either to end the Halden-Index or hand it full control. Streets simmer while officials hide behind screens.
underground.contextual_reframing: Public debate is stage-managed. Council ‘listens’ but BCI scores still rule jobs, homes, futures. Don’t buy the system’s ‘openness’ story.

underground.headline: Council Feuds Go Public
underground.anchor_line: Power struggle erupts in plain view. Factions inside the council clash while systems stall and public screens go dark.
underground.contextual_reframing: Even the government’s own loop glitches. When ‘stability’ fails, the only constant is control—not consent.
